definitions: the state or condition of being covered or saturated with water or another liquid; dampness

examples.text: the pale brown of the rock was blotched with wetness
he wiped the wetness from his face with the edge of his shirt

shortDefinitions: state or condition of being covered or saturated with water or another liquid

examples.text: the long dark wetness of winter

definitions: a lack of forcefulness or strength of character; feebleness

examples.text: a profession which regards loyalty as weakness and decency as wetness

shortDefinitions: lack of forcefulness or strength of character
